column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This most recent trip
column2: we started off with the baked goat cheese.  It was so hearty
column3: it was like eating eggplant parmesan.  Then I ordered the lamb chop with a side of bone marrow.  My boyfriend ordered the classic ribeye. We shared the loaded baked potato.The lamb chop was amazing! Not gamey at all
column4: juicy and fatty deliciousness.  The bone marrow is a must. The ribeye was also perfectly cooked both temperature and seasoning wise.
